messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] heaven/hell
messages.msgSnippet: Christianity comes from Christ, religion is man made. There is no mention in the bible of Catholics, Protestants, Lutherans, Baptists, Methodists, these were
messages.messageBody:
Christianity comes from Christ, religion is man made.
There is no mention in the bible of Catholics,
Protestants, Lutherans, Baptists, Methodists, these
were all created by man.

Leslie
--- gruvystarchild <starsuncloud@...> wrote:
> Christianity is
> a belief not a religion "
>
> Since when? It is both. For some of us, believing in
> the message that
> Christ brought is enough to claim the term
> "Christian"...but when
> those beliefs are in direct opposition to the
> majority of Christian
> churches/religions, you've got to then wonder if
> we're really
> Christian's at all?
> Maybe we're followers of Christ. Christianity is
> indeed a religion, a
> religion with powerful people trying to control the
> people we put
> into government, how the homeschool laws are written
> and so on.
> It is a belief for myself also, but that does not
> negate the
> existance of a religion with some very powerful and
> negative messages.
>
> Ren
>
>

messages.subject: heaven/hell
messages.msgSnippet: Christianity is a belief not a religion  Since when? It is both. For some of us, believing in the message that Christ brought is enough to claim the term
messages.messageBody:
Christianity is
a belief not a religion "

Since when? It is both. For some of us, believing in the message that
Christ brought is enough to claim the term "Christian"...but when
those beliefs are in direct opposition to the majority of Christian
churches/religions, you've got to then wonder if we're really
Christian's at all?
Maybe we're followers of Christ. Christianity is indeed a religion, a
religion with powerful people trying to control the people we put
into government, how the homeschool laws are written and so on.
It is a belief for myself also, but that does not negate the
existance of a religion with some very powerful and negative messages.

Ren
